Package Controllers

Class MovieManagerMovieGoer

java.lang.Object
Controllers.MovieManagerMovieGoer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
Direct Known Subclasses:
MovieManagerAdmin
public class MovieManagerMovieGoer extends Object implements Manager
Manage movie goers and associated functions. Can contain multiple movie goers.

    • getAllReview

      public static void getAllReview(int movieId)

      Parameters:
      movieId - movie ID of associated movie

    • getOverallRatings

      public static float getOverallRatings(int movieId)
      Find the overall average rating for a given movie.
      Parameters:
      movieId - search by movie ID
      Returns:
      an average score of the rating of the movie

    • printOverallRatings

      public static void printOverallRatings(int movieId)
      Print the overall ratings of movieId
      Parameters:
      movieId - movie ID of associated movie

    • addRatingAndReview

      public static void addRatingAndReview(Scanner sc)
      Add rating and review. Calls RatingAndReviewManager's static method.
      Parameters:
      sc - to pass into the createReview method

    • getTicketSales

      public static int getTicketSales(int movieId)
      Get ticket sales by movie ID.
      Parameters:
      movieId - search field
      Returns:
      total number of tickets that the movie sold

    • findMovie

      public static Movie findMovie(String movieName)
      Read method Find a single movie by movie name
      Parameters:
      movieName - The movie name of the movie to be queried
      Returns:
      Object of type Movie if successful search, else return null

    • getTop5MoviesByTicketSales

      public static void getTop5MoviesByTicketSales()
      Get top 5 movies by ticket sales. Utilizes the getTicketSales function and puts this data into a hashmap, where the movieId is the key and the tickets sold are the values. Sorts the hashmap from largest to smallest. Prints the top 5 movies by ticket sales.

    • getTop5MoviesByRating

      public static void getTop5MoviesByRating()
      Get top 5 movies by rating Utilizes the getOverallRatings function to put the overall ratings for a movie (as values) with the movieID as the key. Does a descending sort of the hashmap. Prints the top 5 movies by rating.

    • printMovieListMovieGoer

      public static void printMovieListMovieGoer()
      Print method to display only preview and now_showing on the txt file database.

    • readMovies

      protected static ArrayList readMovies(String filename) throws IOException
      Reading helper function that creates a list of instances of movies
      Parameters:
      filename - filename of file to be read
      Returns:
      Array List with extracted values from file
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O Error with input

    • saveMovies

      protected static void saveMovies(String filename, List al) throws IOException
      Save function for movies. Converts from list to String format to subsequently be written to target file.
      Parameters:
      filename - of write location
      al - list with new contents for saving
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O Error with input
